name: Rock, Paper... SPAM!!!
description:
Spam-Mode:
  • SPAM the key of the hand you want to show.
  • Your hand must glow red when the timer reaches 0 in order to count.
Quick-Mode:
  • PRESS the key of the hand you want to show.
  • The hand you are showing when the timer reaches 0 is the one that counts.
CONTROLS:
